SQL.LOAD: SELECT format, build_method, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, regular_expression_id FROM elita.elp_regular_expression WHERE regular_expression_id = :regular_expression_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elita.elp_regular_expression SET format = :format, build_method = :build_method, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE regular_expression_id = :regular_expression_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elita.elp_regular_expression ( format, build_method, created_by, regular_expression_id ) VALUES ( :format, :build_method, :created_by, :regular_expression_id )
